channel.title: Sufi Reflections Podcast
channel.description: A variety of themes and topics of importance, as well as relevance, to the Islamic spiritual tradition and everyday life are explored from a Sufi perspective.

item.title: Sufi Reflections Podcast - Program 42
item.description: This is the 42nd and most recent release in a continuing series of podcasts entitled 'Sufi Reflections'. The running length is one hour and 32 minutes. It contains poetry, music, Quranic recitation, an essay entitled 'Annihilaton', a short story with the title of 'A Gift', and a commentary entitled 'An Introduction to The Unfinished Revolution The Battle for America's Soul'
item.author: bill@spiritual-health.org (Bill Whitehouse)
